name: Carts'n Guns
description:
2D Pixel Game - 2 Players - 1 Computer

This game needs 2 players with 1 keyboard and 1 screen only (play on the same computer)

It's a basic little game where you will have to win at least 2/3 rounds.

Each players starts with 5Hearts and you'll have buffs availables that will spawn on the map.

The rules are told in the game once you start a game.

Unzip the project and start the .exe

Enjoy p:
